description:
Greenery is a cryptocurrency wallet developed by Greenfire to be the defacto Multichain 
cryptocurrency wallet for Avid traders and businesses. Greenery solves the problem of users having to 
retrieve data about their holdings from multiple sources by centralizing everything in an easy to use, 
clean and beautiful interface.

Greenery allows users to manage multiple wallet addresses per currency supported, issue invoices 
denominated in crypto and fully supports human readable address protocols of Unstoppable Domains, 
Tezos Domains and Ethereum Name Service.
summary: A Cryptocurrency wallet with bookkeeping and accounting functionality for web3 and defi.
author: Greenfire
